result.reason: The current 'Disconnect' functionality for groups only affects immediate children. It should be updated to recursively disconnect all nested connections within the group.
result.approach: Modify DisconnectConnectionInternal in ConnectionContextMenu.cs to use container.GetRecursiveChildList() instead of iterating only direct children, ensuring all nested connections are disconnected.
